modName: Yin and Yang Quiver and Fletching  w Daedric option

descriptionHtml:
Now an optional Daedric replacer also, as per request

Please endorse if you like it. I am tempted to make a bow mod to follow these.
-------------------------------------------
 Yin and Yang Quiver and Fletching

pictures will vary based on your FXAA settings.
( simply replaces steel arrows and those ugly reddish fletchings they have )
author: Stelk
